text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Government and United Nations Development Programme to carry out projects in Bahrain.
- Algerian president sends message to Bahrain's emir on bilateral relations.
- Awarding contract for new power and water plant expected later this year.
- Bahrain invited to attend conference of Islamic Chamber of Commerce and Industry. Meeting to be held in Jakarta in October to discuss role of private sector in Moslem states.
